page.title: 02 Emergency Services:Disaster
page.content: {Chester Chronicle 29/3/85:}Fire engines,ambulances and police cars raced to{Deeside High School}last week equipped for a major disaster.The school fire alarms had sounded and police received telephone calls about a suspicious character in the school grounds having been seen shortly before a bomb exploded in the boiler house.The students were being tested on weeks of theory put in for the community studies lessons.The disaster was all a carefully planned hoax.Weeks of meticulous planning and liasing with the area's emergency services had culminated in this realistic operation. My dad Mike Nichol works at the ambulance station. His time-table is 07.30 to 19.30hrs on days for 4 days and 1930 to 0730hrs on nights for a week.My dad likes it and he wants to work as long as he can.NICOLA SHONE
